artist: Artist: Jim Dine; Publisher: Arion Press
description: 29 woodcuts with text bound in wood covers with white leather spine housed in an oak wood box/tray; latches to an oak wood box that sits on top and houses an imbedded relief sculpture of a skull face cast in bonded plaster painted in muted colors of gray, purple and green
image_copyright: © Jim Dine %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Woodcuts and letterpress, bound volume; together with hand-painted cast plaster relief sculpture mounted in a wood box
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil by the artist and publisher on the colophon page: Jim Dine / Andrew Hoyem
title: The Apocalypse: The Revelation of Saint John the Divine
